__e: But god, in his infinite wisdom, has made sure it is just enough for us.
He's got a plan for each and every one of us and, in his infinite wisdom, he makes no mistakes.
Oh, yeah, it would be my fault that I got hurt, because I didn't listen to you in your infinite wisdom.
A city of infinite possibilities... especially in the rain.
The newcomers are just looking for the same thing we are... a place to be free to stake out our dreams, a place with unlimited possibilities.
We now live in a time of endless possibility.
